name: Dungeon Prototype (Zachkingcade)
description:
This is  a simple rogue like made for the MSU 2021 GameJam, this submission will not be judge as I am one of the judges and event lead but feel free to check it out and give it a rating.

Goal: Your goal is to find keys to unlock a hatch on 3 different floors and then fight a final boss.

controls: WASD to move and the mouse to aim and fire.
